name: DayzFinder
description:
DayzFinder provides you the DayZ Standalone map, and lets you place markers (player positions, destination) .

DayzFinder automatically shares those markers and positions with friends in your group (with a FREE account creation without personnal information or email, only need a login, a team name and a password).

Features :
- DayZ Standalone Map Chernarus+
- Find easily the nearest city around you.
- See all water pump.
- Measure the distance between your position and your destination.
- High-resolution offline map.
- Zoom in Chernarus+ Map.
- Join groups with password protection.
- Retina Support.
- iPod, iPad, iPhone 4, 4S and iPhone 5 Support.

And more coming soon ....


This app is for non-commercial use only.

DayZ Standalone is a trademark of Bohemia Interactive
DayZ created by Dean "Rocket" Hall, © 2012-2013

The map of Chernarus+ is for game by Bohemia Interactive and was obtained from publicly available sources.
